name: Isolated Controls
description:
This was done in two days with a group of 7 people; 2 programmers, 3 artists and 2 game designers as part of a game jam for Academy of Interactive Entertainment. 

The theme was Isolated Control which involves guiding a robot to his doom, using busted buttons to control it. 

Programmers: Oscar, Ruben.

Artists: Chloe, Jeremy, Alexander.

Designers: Lincoln, Aaron.
